Class: Preloader

util/preload. Preloader

new Preloader()

Create a preloader for fetching multiple image files.

Methods

addImage(file, tag, fnStore)

Adds an image file to the preloader.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
file String The file to load
tag String Some tag to help you identify the file when it's loaded
fnStore Function <optional>
 A callback to receive the loaded image, in the form 
function(image, tag) {
}
Where the image is a loaded Image object.

load(fnComplete, fnProgress, fnError)

Start the preloader
Parameters:
Name Type Description
fnComplete Function Callback when all files are loaded.
fnProgress Function Called periodically with progress expressed as a number between 0 and 1.
fnError Function Called on each load error.
